question: Is the Booking Amount refundable?
answer: No, The booking amount is not refundable. In case of cancellations, charges would be levied.

question: Will alcohol be served?
answer: No, alcohol will not be served on the trip, although it is not restricted and its on you.

question: Will alcohol be served?
answer: No, alcohol will not be served on the trip, although it is not restricted and its on you.

question: Can I board/deboard the bus from Chandigarh instead of Delhi?
answer: Yes, in both the cases, Boarding & Deboarding are allowed from Chandigarh/Delhi.

question: If I board the bus from Chandigarh will I get a discounted price?
answer: No, one will not get a discount in such a case.

question: What is the type of travelling bus?
answer: It will be FULL AC-Semi Sleeper Volvo bus.

question: Is lunch included in the package?
answer: Only Breakfast and Dinner are included with the package, Lunch will not be served to anyone.

question: Is lunch included in the package?
answer: Only Breakfast and Dinner are included with the package, Lunch will not be served to anyone.

question: Is there any faculty going to accompany us?
How many people will be sharing a single room?
answer: Room sharing on a Quad-Sharing bases.

question: How many people will be sharing a single room?
answer: Room sharing on a Quad-Sharing bases.
